remarks: The univariate polynomial ring has the same one as the corresponding multivariate polynomial ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ply1mpl1.m $e |- M = ( 1o mPoly R ) $.
ply1mpl1.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ply1mpl1.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` P ) $.
ply1mpl1 $p |- .1. = ( 1r ` M ) $.
